attributes.action: lower the age of being able to buy alcohol to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The majority of young people just buy fake IDs or get older people to get alcohol for them. This makes a lot of young people hang about street corners etc. This makes them an easy target for peadophiles etc. Allowing these young drinkers into pubs clubs... would enable them to be monitored and not cause disruption in public parks or residential schemes. this would also curb scotland / uk gang culture of drinking then gang wars.

          lower the age limit
